content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in salerno regarding the division of an inheritance between two parties referred to as ta and lvl the court ruled that the deceased persons legitimate succession was open and dissolved the community property between lv and ta the court approved a division plan that included various properties such as apartments land and agricultural areas an expert appointed by the court determined the total value of the assets the court assigned different portions of the assets to ta and lvl and ordered lvl to pay an adjustment amount to ta the court also stated that the judgment should be transcribed by the competent registrars office the court considered the interests of the parties and the condition of the assets in preparing the division plan the court determined the value of the assets based on market value and approved the division plan assigned portions to the parties and ordered the payment of the adjustment amount the court also addressed the regulation of court costs stating that they should be borne by the parties in proportion to their respective shares the final ruling was made on december 10 2009

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale di Salerno sez. II, 24/11/2009, n.2465
